questions.question_text: Identify three application standard lookups that are available in the Setup and Maintenance task list ‘Define Supplier Configuration’.
Identify three profile options that are used to configure Self Service Procurement.

discussion.content:
C. POR_DISPLAY_EMBEDDED_ANALYTICS
there is no such profile with this in name in oracle cloud 20D
The answer is: C. The Singapore BU must be assigned the Payables business function.
Singapore BU that provides only payment services for both Korea and China BUs. The answer should be C

choices.C: The Singapore BU must be assigned the Payables business function.
choices.A: The Singapore BU must be assigned with the Billing and Revenue and Payables Invoicing business functions.
choices.B: The China BU must be assigned the Billing and Revenue and Requisitioning business functions.
choices.D: The Korea BU must be assigned the Receiving, Payables Invoicing, and Payables Payment business functions.
choices.E: The US BU must be assigned the Requisitioning and Procurement business functions.

questions.question_text:
Your customer wants to configure four business units (BUs) as follows:
- Korea, China BUs that perform only requisitioning-related business processes and tasks.
- A US BU that is configured as a shared Procurement BU with only the Procurement function enabled.
- A Singapore BU that provides only payment services for both Korea and China BUs.
Identify an applicable setup to represent how the business unit is used.

choices.C: The supplier can view the deliverable by opening the contract in the Contracts tab in the Supplier Portal.
choices.A: The supplier can view the deliverable from the Supplier Portal by clicking the Manage Deliverables link.
choices.D: The supplier can view the deliverable by navigating to the Agreements tab from the Supplier Portal.
choices.B: The supplier can view the deliverable from the Supplier Portal under the Deliverables tab.

questions.question_text:
During an implementation where Procurement Contract and Supplier Portal are being implemented, the Procurement Contract user (buyer) has created deliverables on a supplier, which also has an identified Supplier Portal user. The supplier has requested the buyer to email details of the deliverable.
Advise the buyer on how he or she can communicate the deliverable details to the supplier through the application.

An automobile parts manufacturer has decided to implement only the Cloud Purchasing product from the Oracle Procurement Cloud pillar. Which setup component will not be required for this implementation?

discussion.content: Answer should be D - Negotiation template

Selected Answer: D
Answer should be D
